document_data.name: Yegora
document_data.mainbody: '''Yegora, the Maw of Myth Drannor''' was a great [[purple worm]] that laired beneath the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The worm lived in a series of shallow caves beneath the city, accessible from the surface by great craters blasted into the ground.
